title: Homework-The Ugly Tree
description:
import turtle
wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("light blue")
wn.title("The Terrible Tree")

A = turtle.Turtle()
A.penup()
A.setx(-10)
A.sety(-200)
A.pendown()
A.pencolor("yellow")
A.pensize(2)
A.fillcolor("brown")
A.begin_fill()
A.right(90)
A.forward(100)
A.left(90)
A.forward(20)
A.left(90)
A.forward(100)
A.hideturtle()
A.end_fill()
A.hideturtle


B = turtle.Turtle()
B.penup()
B.setx(0)
B.sety(135)
B.pendown()
B.pensize(3)
B.begin_fill()
B.fillcolor("forestgreen")
B.pencolor("DarkSeaGreen3")
B.left(-120)
B.forward(100)
B.left(120)
B.forward(27)
B.right(120)
B.forward(150)
B.left(120)
B.forward(40)
B.right(120)
B.forward(134)
B.left(120)
B.forward(250)
B.left(120)
B.forward(134)
B.right(120)
B.forward(40)
B.left(120)
B.forward(150)
B.right(120)
B.forward(27)
B.left(120)
B.forward(100)
B.end_fill()
B.hideturtle()

C = turtle.Turtle()
C.penup()
C.setx(-24)
C.sety(135)
C.pendown()
C.pensize(1)
C.begin_fill()
C.fillcolor("gold")
C.pencolor("yellow")
C.forward(48)
C.right(144)
C.forward(48)
C.right(144)
C.forward(48)
C.right(144)
C.forward(48)
C.right(144)
C.forward(48)
C.end_fill()
C.hideturtle
